title: Mobile Developer
overview: Developing an iOS mobile application using Swift and UIKit, designed as an interactive demonstration of Adria Business & Technology’s proposed solutions. The app simulated key banking processes — such as checkbook requests, money transfers, and card and account management — allowing clients to visualize the functionality of their future product before the start of custom development.

title: IA Developer
overview: Developing a platform with Django, featuring three main functionalities: generating relevant keywords and phrases for a given topic along with their intention and search volume, analyzing web pages to assess their compliance with SEO rules, and generating meta-descriptions for various content.

title: Intern in Oceanographic Data Management
overview: Contributed to the management, processing, and analysis of oceanographic data at INRH Tangier. Assisted in the setup and optimization of database management processes, ensured data quality and integrity, and supported the visualization and analysis of scientific data.
